messages.message:
Brian
How do you spell your blonde roommate's name?  And did she see all the pictures of her?
Elyse Field. And, yeah, I showed her the pictures. The flash on that camera is amazing. Oh, and you need to send me the video of my drunken brother. Blackmail, you know.  heh heh.

Brian
Hey you can download them off my server.  It is a pretty excellent camera but I am thinking about upgrading to an HD camcorder, they are getting pretty small these days.  Just download the two video files at the bottom of the list.
Index of /Share/Pictures/Pictures/2008-04-19 Battlestar Party After Party Week 3
209.250.30.30
Thank you so much for the video. It makes me smile.
